member.name: P:Karcero.Engine.Models.DungeonConfiguration.Randomness
member.summary: Controls how random the map is (how many twists and turns). Value is between 0 and 1, higher value means more random.

member.name: P:Karcero.Engine.Models.DungeonConfiguration.Sparseness
member.summary: Controls how sparse the map is. Value is between 0 and 1, higher value means more sparse.

member.name: P:Karcero.Engine.Models.DungeonConfiguration.ChanceToRemoveDeadends
member.summary: Controls how many dead ends are left Value is between 0 and 1, higher value == less deadends.
